DocumentForms.summary:
The forms read-only property of
the interface returns an listing
all the form elements contained in the document.

blockquote.para:
Note: Similarly, you can access a list of a form's component user
input elements using the property.

DocumentForms.value:
An object listing all of the document's forms. Each item
in the collection is a representing a single
<form> element.If the document has no forms, the returned collection is empty, with a length of zero.
